CSGO is actually easy game, just need to work on communication, aim, map awareness, crosshair placement, economy management, pistol aim, AWP flicks, grenade spots, smoke spots, pop flashes, positioning, bomb plant positions, retake ability, bunny hoping, strafing, spray control and getting kills.

This game is a pile of dookies, don't waste your time unless you have friends that demand you play it.

I like everything about it. This is an edit from 2 years after my initial review, but this game is really recommended for people who like fps games. ( First Person Shooter) The only problem is that there are many cheaters in the community ever seen CSGO went free. If you didn't know, for the person who is reading this review, there are different trust factors. 
- Green trust factor are mostly legit players but sometime, there are cheaters in green trust.
- Yellow trust factor has a lot of cheaters, high chance of meeting them, but of course, there will always be legit players in yellow trust.
-Red trust factor. Do I even have to explain? A shit ton of cheaters.
Hope you found this review helpful.
